Trupti Desai is a well: known social activist in India, particularly recognized for her attempts to enter the Sabarimala temple in Kerala, which was previously banned to women. This information establishes her identity and background.
The claim that Trupti Desai was arrested: 19 lockdown is false. The video actually shows an incident from September 2019 when she was detained during an anti-alcohol protest in Pune. This information was confirmed through a keyword search and an interview with Desai herself, where she refuted the claim.
